main_definition: A situation where something happens later than expected or planned.

meanings_and_examples.example: Due to bad weather, the school decided to delay the start of classes by one hour.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The time taken for something to occur after it has started
meanings_and_examples.example: The delivery of our package was delayed because of customs clearance.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A delay in a transportation system, such as a train or plane
meanings_and_examples.example: Our flight got delayed by two hours due to air traffic congestion.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An intentional slowdown for political reasons
meanings_and_examples.example: The union decided to delay the work shift in order to negotiate better pay conditions.
